snippet.title: Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story | A Day in the Life | Official Pre-Order Trailer
snippet.description:
One little Yordle, one humongous problem.

From Lazy Bear, the studio that brought you Graveyard Keeper, comes Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story™. Jump into this delightful crafting RPG set in the magical world of Bandle City, home of the fuzzy and fun-loving yordles.

Coming February 21, 2024 to Nintendo Switch, Steam, GOG, and Epic Games.

Pre-Order now to receive the exclusive in-game “Bandle Scout Recon Pack” that includes:
Bandle Scout Poro &  Scout Hat
Prismatic Trail Effect
Evergreen Cottage & Yordle Snap Treat

Stay up to date:
Twitter (@RiotForge)
Facebook (@RiotForge)
Instagram (@RiotForge)

Learn more about Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story: https://bandletale.com 
Learn more about Lazy Bear Games: http://lazybeargames.com/ 
Learn more about Riot Forge: https://riotforgegames.com/
